Articles.Content:
Well, in typical kerbal style, on first attempting to sign up, I created 'tehcoshman' Ã‚Â¬_Ã‚Â¬ started on a good foot there.

pfff.... this is a big old text box... erm... I clock up like 10+ hours a day on average it seems according to steam...

erm... yeah... hi?!

Hello there!

*Explosions*

Whoops, just another day here at KSP.

Seemingly every time I crash land there are two outcomes; either it blows up and good, or I bust a light. It is the strangest thing because I can almost tell what is going to happen if it is going bad. Oh, and lets not talk about time acceleration..... bad things happen at 1000x speed and phone calls. Lost Bobcat Kerman to the Mun doing that
Yeah, I've time warped myself into plenty of bad situations. I play with mods now, so I use Kerbal Alarm Clock.

The worst is going for an aerocapture at 10000x warp, and just passing through the atmo and back out from the planets SoI without noticing.. So many kerbals have died of starvation in kerbol orbit..

And yeah, hi, and welcome to the forums
